name: Intimate partner violence or sexual violence risk assessment conducted
title: Intimate partner violence or sexual violence risk assessment conducted
description: Whether or not an assessment was conducted to determine if the health worker determines the client has a risk of being  subjected to violence

element.short: Intimate partner violence or sexual violence risk assessment conducted
element.comment: WHO does not recommend universal screening for violence of women attending health care. WHO does encourage health-care providers to raise the topic with women who have injuries or conditions that they suspect may be related to violence.

code.display: Intimate partner violence or sexual violence risk assessment conducted (ICD-11)
